text: Paper (also known as Paper Mag) is an American independent magazine. It primarily focuses on fashion, popular culture, nightlife, music, art, and film. They originally produced every month. Later the magazine became a quarterly publication. A digital version was made available online at papermag.com. In 2020, physical production of the magazine has stopped because of the arrival of the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States. Digital content still continues to be published through the website. == References == Category:Magazines published in New York City Category:Defunct magazines of the United States
title: Paper (magazine)
